p: For the investigation of cytotoxic activity, Dulbeccoâ€™s modified Eagle medium (DMEM), heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum (FBS), L-glutamine, non-essential amino acids, dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), penicillin and streptomycin, as well as a trypsin and ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) combination dissolved in phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). Finally, 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5 diphenyltetrazolium bromide dye (MTT) was purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
